item.title: The Song of Soil
item.description: 1 The Song of Soil We, the sand animated with the fire of suns, lay intertwined in love beneath the stars of eternity, knowing we were mortal, and knowing, that on our passing, our soil would lay fertile beds for new growth and the embers of our hearts would be sparks to light new flames.
